name: 测试1
note_text:
→我相信骑士团。
→但这不代表我会信任他们，即使就短暂的接触来看，不管是歌洛莉亚还是泰登，都是值得信赖的正直骑士，但他们终究是外国势力。
→他们远道而来绝对是有所图谋，我不能相信他们。如果拉维耶在的话，一定也会抱有同样的怀疑。
→基于生存的压力，我们需要一个强大的盟友，我们会紧密的合作一段时间——比如他们正准备修筑一个据点，我们可以帮上忙以换取暂时的骑士团庇护。
→<#0000FF>但我也要留好后手，毕竟他们不远万里坐船来伊利亚，绝对不是为了做好人好事的。

name: 测试2
text: 他们远道而来可不是搞慈善的
note_text:
→我不相信骑士团。
→但这不代表我会信任他们，即使就短暂的接触来看，不管是歌洛莉亚还是泰登，都是值得信赖的正直骑士，但他们终究是外国势力。
→他们远道而来绝对是有所图谋，我不能相信他们。如果拉维耶在的话，一定也会抱有同样的怀疑。
→基于生存的压力，我们需要一个强大的盟友，我们会紧密的合作一段时间——比如他们正准备修筑一个据点，我们可以帮上忙以换取暂时的骑士团庇护。
→但我也要留好后手，毕竟他们不远万里坐船来伊利亚，绝对不是为了做好人好事的。

name: 测试3
note_text: 相信原因1。→我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。

name: 测试4
note_text: 相信原因2。

name: 测试5
note_text: 不相信原因1。→我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。

name: 测试6
note_text: 不相信原因2。

name: zhm测试选项1-A
note_text: 这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B
note_text: 这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。

name: QV3-P3-参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1-选项1
text: Quickly aligning with a side in the conflict is sensible.
note_text:
The earlier we choose a certain faction in the war, the more beneficial it will be for us. 
As we all know, the Union is more powerful than the Empire and the King's Army, and their combat will and belief are also very strong.

name: QV3-P3-参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1-选项2
text: It's just a matter of expediency to cooperate with the Union
note_text:
It's just a matter of expediency anyway to form an alliance with the Union. 
We must be responsible for ourselves and the town. 
Besides, Lutfi seems to have the same idea.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1-选项1
note_text:
He has always been trying to help the Town of Convallaria and the Mercenary Group.
He provided us with grain and profitable orders and reconciled our relationship with the Union. 
He is certainly not a born yesman, but he is friendly and sincere to us.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1-选项2
text: He must be brewing a conspiracy
note_text:
As a prince, he is unlikely to be a born yesman. 
He must have his own plan by winning over the Sword of Convallaria so hard... Should we believe him? 
Or should we get closer to Paladin Gloria?

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1-选项1
note_text:
She is a good and righteous person. 
In order to save us, she didn't hesitate to turn back and fought to the last moment. 
It makes me believe that she is a noble person who really wants to fight for peace.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1-选项2
note_text:
I'm very grateful to her for saving us, and I also admire her personality and character. 
But I'm afraid she will sacrifice the town for a correct but naive reason. 
I will never hurt her. But if we want to end the war...
Maybe Lutfi is more pragmatic.

name: QV3-P4-关于二王子的计划-选择1-选项1
text: What Lutfi is pursuing may not be the truth
note_text:
Lutfi doesn't sincerely cooperate with the Order. 
He seems to just use the power of the Union first and then get rid of it. 
I'm not sure about the process, but the key may be the Waverun City incident. 
That means... what he is pursuing may not be the truth of the Waverun City incident...

name: QV3-P4-关于二王子的计划-选择1-选项2
text: Lutfi's plan may bring the dawn of peace
note_text:
Lutfi doesn't sincerely cooperate with the Union. 
He seems to just use the power of the Union first and then get rid of it. 
If he can do it, there is no doubt that it can bring peace as soon as possible. 
I think we can trust him, and the Sword of Convallaria will cooperate with him. 
We must do so for Iria and ourselves.

name: QV3-P5-二王子的来信-选择1-选项1
note_text:
Nothing is more important than the truth. If there is anyone who is most likely to find out the truth, it must be Gloria. 
I should help her.

name: QV3-P5-二王子的来信-选择1-选项2
note_text:
Lutfi is right. Only Irians can bring peace to Iria. He is more capable of ending this war than the naive knight. 
I will do as he said.

name: zhm测试选项1-A-A
note_text: zhm测试选项1-A-A的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-A-B
note_text: zhm测试选项1-A-B的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B-A
note_text: zhm测试选项1-B-A的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B-B
note_text: zhm测试选项1-B-B的笔记文本。

name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1-选择1
text: The Papal States' intentions were good, but they chose the wrong course of action.
note_text:
The Papal States, who wanted quick peace, were too radical. The trust between the two countries needs time to rebuild, or at least both sides should have the intention to negotiate.
Although the goal that Samantha and I were pursuing cannot be achieved immediately, as there is not only one road to peace, we still have time and opportunities.

name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1-选择2
text: The Papal States' actions were unreasonable from the beginning.
note_text:
The Papal States never had any intention of resolving things peacefully. There was no effort to accomodate the needs of Iria's people in the treaty. All it served to do was widen the rift between the two nations and make peace even less likely. 
Samantha suffered a horrible blow as well. Instead of peace, it is now war which looms over the horizon. We have have to do something, but at this moment, who can say what the correct path is?
